name: Adding Fractions with Like Denominators
description: Understand addition of fractions with the same denominator as joining parts referring to the same whole.
subject: Mathematics

curriculumStandards.description: Understand addition and subtraction of fractions as joining and separating parts referring to the same whole.

name: Understanding Unit Fractions
description: Understand a fraction 1/b as the quantity formed by 1 part when a whole is partitioned into b equal parts.
subject: Mathematics

name: Identifying Prime Numbers less than 100
description: Recognize prime numbers as whole numbers greater than 1 that have only two factors: 1 and themselves.
subject: Mathematics

curriculumStandards.description: Find all factor pairs for a whole number in the range 1-100. Recognize that a whole number is a multiple of each of its factors. Determine whether a given whole number in the range 1-100 is prime or composite.

name: Multiplication Facts Fluency (0-10)
description: Fluently multiply and divide within 100, using strategies such as the relationship between multiplication and division or properties of operations.
subject: Mathematics

name: Identifying Main Idea and Supporting Details
description: Determine the main idea of a text and explain how it is supported by key details; summarize the text.
subject: English Language Arts
